# miceDRF: imputation with mice DRF and I-Score

miceDRF is an R package that extends the functionality of the
[mice](https://github.com/amices/mice) package by providing a new method
for handling missing data using Distributed Random Forests (DRF).

## Installation

To install the latest development version directly from GitHub, run the
following code in your R console:

``` r
if (!requireNamespace("devtools", quietly = TRUE)) {
  install.packages("devtools")
}
devtools::install_github("KrystynaGrzesiak/miceDRF")
```

## Example usage

``` r

library(miceDRF)
library(mice)

# Generate a random dataset
n <- 200
d <- 5
X <- matrix(runif(n * d), nrow = n, ncol = d)

# Introduce missing values
pmiss <- 0.2
X.NA <- apply(X, 2, function(x) {
  U <- runif(length(x))
  ifelse(U <= pmiss, NA, x)
})

# Perform imputation with DRF method
imp <- mice(X.NA, m = 1, method = "DRF")
Ximp <- complete(imp)
```

## Citation

If you use miceDRF in your research, please cite the following work:

NÃ¤f, J., Grzesiak, K., and Scornet, E. (2025a). How to rank imputation
methods? arXiv preprint arXiv:2507.11297
(<https://doi.org/10.48550/arXiv.2507.11297>).

# Package index

## All functions

- [`Iscore()`](https://krystynagrzesiak.github.io/miceDRF/reference/Iscore.md)
  : Calculates score for one imputation function
- [`Iscore_cat()`](https://krystynagrzesiak.github.io/miceDRF/reference/Iscore_cat.md)
  : energy-I-Score for imputation of categorical (mixed) data
- [`Iscores_compare()`](https://krystynagrzesiak.github.io/miceDRF/reference/Iscores_compare.md)
  : Calculates IScores for multiple imputation functions
- [`create_mice_imputation()`](https://krystynagrzesiak.github.io/miceDRF/reference/create_mice_imputation.md)
  : Very internal function for getting mice methods
- [`create_mice_imputations()`](https://krystynagrzesiak.github.io/miceDRF/reference/create_mice_imputations.md)
  : A function creating list of mice imputation functions
- [`do_one_hot()`](https://krystynagrzesiak.github.io/miceDRF/reference/do_one_hot.md)
  : One hot encoding
- [`energy_dist()`](https://krystynagrzesiak.github.io/miceDRF/reference/energy_dist.md)
  : Energy distance
- [`factor_to_numeric()`](https://krystynagrzesiak.github.io/miceDRF/reference/factor_to_numeric.md)
  : Internal function for changing factors to numerical
- [`factor_to_onehot()`](https://krystynagrzesiak.github.io/miceDRF/reference/factor_to_onehot.md)
  : One hot encoding
- [`impute_mice_drf()`](https://krystynagrzesiak.github.io/miceDRF/reference/impute_mice_drf.md)
  : mice DRF (Distributional Random Forest)
- [`mice.impute.DRF()`](https://krystynagrzesiak.github.io/miceDRF/reference/mice.impute.DRF.md)
  : mice DRF (Distributional Random Forest)
- [`onehot_to_factor()`](https://krystynagrzesiak.github.io/miceDRF/reference/onehot_to_factor.md)
  : One hot encoding
